name: Fight Loop
description:
Made by Craig Cordeiro for TOJAM 2021!

Fight Loop is multiplayer (networked) isometric arena fighter. It's two to twenty players so play with friends!

Controls:

  • Move: WASD (or arrow keys)
  • Look: Mouse
  • Skill 1: Left mouse button (or 1)
  • Skill 2: Right mouse button (or 2)
  • Skill 3: Middle mouse button (or 3).

Note: Gladiator only has two skills.
